GameObjects

Class SimpleSpaceObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObjects.SimpleSpaceObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpaceObject

    public class SimpleSpaceObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpaceObject
    The simplest way to make a "concrete" SpaceObject--using the Polygon class to provide most of the behavior
    Author:
    sdexter72

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleSpaceObject(Point[] inShape, Point inOffset, double inRotation)
      The only constructor, hooks up with Polygon constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleSpaceObject

        public SimpleSpaceObject(Point[] inShape,
                 Point inOffset,
                 double inRotation)
        The only constructor, hooks up with Polygon constructor
        Parameters:
        inShape - an array of Points specifying the shape of the Polygon (see Polygon docs)
        inOffset - initial position of the Polygon in space
        inRotation - initial rotation of the Polygon
